mapper.select: select * from imageFile where id in( ${ids} )
mapper.insert:
insert into imageFile ( imagefilename, imagefiletype, imagefileused, filerealpath, iszip, downloads, createDate, createTime )values( #{imageFileName}, #{imagefiletype}, #{imagefileused}, #{filerealpath}, #{iszip}, #{downloads}, #{createDate}, #{createTime} )
SELECT max(id) as id from imageFile
